name: Alone in the woods (Landelin, unBonChasseur)
description:
Your goal : 

How long can you survive in this hostile world ? 

Plant vegetables to survive and protect your farm at all cost. 

Don't starve to death ! 

Controls : 

W A S D to move around 

<1> , <2> or <3> to first plow the tile

 <1> , <2> or <3> to plant a carrot, a tomato or a corn

F to build a fence or X to destroy it

G to build a gate or X to destroy it

Left Mouse to attack 

------------------------ CAUTION : Required configuration --------------------

i80286 with at least 16 MHz

1024 Ko RAM

A VGA screen

Mono speaker

Keyboard with at least the keys "z, q, s, d, ctrl, escape"

200 Mo disk capacity

Stable electrical installation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kindly developped by : 

Landelin BARDEL

Clément BOUSSARD
